name: Retornos (Conviver Game Jam)
description:
Returns is a 2-player pixel art platformer where you and your partner can discover what a Dog and a Cat can do to escape an enigmatic Ancient Temple.

Controls:
WASD and Arrows or XBOX Joysticks

Made in 48h for Conviver Game Jam.

Dev's Twitter:
@SalyCrafts
@gogdzl

Music by Incompetech
